sentences.sContent: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.sCn: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.sContent: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.sCn: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.sContent: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.sCn: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.sContent: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.sCn: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。
